reviews.name: Samsung White NX1100 Compact System Digital Camera with 20.3 Megapixels and 20-50mm Lens Included
reviews.reviewText: I think its a great camera worth for money.very high quality professional camera.I am delighted to have this before Christmas and got it within 2 days.Thank you.
reviews.title: Its a great camera and beautiful

reviews.name: Samsung White NX1100 Compact System Digital Camera with 20.3 Megapixels and 20-50mm Lens Included
reviews.reviewText:
We've only had this camera for 3 days but so far it seems to be great. I bought it for my wife and she is a techno-phobe so I am always worried when I buy her something electronic. But she signed up for a photography class at the local community college that starts next month and I didn't think her point and shoot camera would fit the bill for her class so I decided to buy her a camera to use in the class. At any rate, so far she's thrilled with the Samsung NX 1100. I have gone through the user's manual and taken a few pictures myself and I really like the camera. I especially like that there is an option to buy a lens adapter so we can buy other than Samsung lenses for the camera. I also like the WiFi capability to send the photos directly from the camera to my wife's iPhone.

After reading reviews online, I knew this was the camera for our purposes, i.e., entry level SLR and I was amazed that Walmart.com beat Best Buy's price by $200 and I had it shipped to our local Walmart store so I didn't have to pay shipping. Made it a no brainer. For less than $300 you can't beat this camera, IMHO.
reviews.title: So Far It's A Great Camera

reviews.name: Samsung White NX1100 Compact System Digital Camera with 20.3 Megapixels and 20-50mm Lens Included
reviews.reviewText:
For the price of $300 camera for mirror less camera, it does not seems to be very valuable camera, the image quality for dark and shade is not so nice, my point and shoot camera does better job for that. it also does not zoom very nice even it comes with 50mm lens.
I would suggest to look for other mirror less camera
reviews.title: OK for this mirror less camera

reviews.name: Samsung White NX1100 Compact System Digital Camera with 20.3 Megapixels and 20-50mm Lens Included
reviews.reviewText:
An incredible camera. I almost bought this at BB for 599.00

I have no qualms about this product. Meets every expectations for a hybrid DSLR camera.
reviews.title: A+ WHAT A DEAL!

reviews.name: Samsung White NX1100 Compact System Digital Camera with 20.3 Megapixels and 20-50mm Lens Included
reviews.reviewText: This thing takes awesome pictures, only downside is that that battery life is a little short lived.
reviews.title: Awesome
